contract receives ETH and distributes it evenly among the recipients corresponding to the top N winning options of a specified proposal. The distribution is triggered by a call from the associated Timelock contract, typically as the execution step of a successful governance proposal.","errors":{"FundingDistributor__InvalidProposalState(uint256,uint8)":[{"params":{"currentState":"The current state of the proposal.","proposalId":"The ID of the proposal."}}],"FundingDistributor__InvalidTopN(uint8,uint8)":[{"params":{"optionCount":"The total number of options for the proposal.","topN":"The invalid number provided."}}],"FundingDistributor__NoWinners(uint256)":[{"params":{"proposalId":"The ID of the proposal."}}],"FundingDistributor__RecipientArrayLengthMismatch(uint256,uint8,uint256)":[{"params":{"actualLength":"The actual number of recipients provided.","expectedLength":"The expected number of recipients (number of proposal options).","proposalId":"The ID of the proposal."}}],"FundingDistributor__TransferFailed(address,uint256)":[{"params":{"amount":"The amount that failed to transfer.","recipient":"The address that failed to receive funds."}}],"FundingDistributor__UnauthorizedCaller(address)":[{"params":{"caller":"The address that attempted the unauthorized call."}}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}]},"events":{"FundsDistributed(uint256,address[],uint256)":{"params":{"amountPerRecipient":"The amount of ETH distributed to each recipient.","proposalId":"The ID of the Governor proposal that triggered the distribution.","recipients":"The list of addresses that received funds."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_governor":"The address of the GovernorCountingMultipleChoice contract.","_initialOwner":"The address to set as the initial owner of this contract.","_timelock":"The address of the Timelock contract authorized to call `distribute`."}},"distribute(uint256,uint8,address[])":{"details":"MUST be called by the `timelock` address. Fetches vote counts for the `proposalId` from the `governor`. Identifies the `topN` winning options (including ties). Distributes the contract's entire ETH balance evenly among the recipients associated with the winning options via the `recipientsByOptionIndex` mapping.","params":{"proposalId":"The ID of the GovernorCountingMultipleChoice proposal.","recipientsByOptionIndex":"An array mapping proposal option index to recipient address.                                The length MUST match the number of options in the proposal.                                e.g., `recipientsByOptionIndex[0]` is the recipient for option 0.","topN":"The number of top winning options to consider for distribution."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."}},"title":"FundingDistributor","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"FundingDistributor__InvalidProposalState(uint256,uint8)":[{"notice":"Error: The target proposal is not in a state where distribution is allowed (e.g., not Succeeded)."}],"FundingDistributor__InvalidTopN(uint8,uint8)":[{"notice":"Error: The number of top winners requested (topN) is invalid (must be > 0 and <= option count)."}],"FundingDistributor__NoWinners(uint256)":[{"notice":"Error: No winners were identified based on the votes and topN parameter."}],"FundingDistributor__RecipientArrayLengthMismatch(uint256,uint8,uint256)":[{"notice":"Error: The length of the provided recipients array does not match the number of options in the proposal."}],"FundingDistributor__TransferFailed(address,uint256)":[{"notice":"Error: Failed to transfer ETH to a recipient."}],"FundingDistributor__UnauthorizedCaller(address)":[{"notice":"Error: The caller is not the authorized Timelock contract."}]},"events":{"FundsDistributed(uint256,address[],uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when funds are successfully distributed."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"constructor":{"notice":"Sets the Governor and Timelock addresses."},"distribute(uint256,uint8,address[])":{"notice":"Distributes the contract's ETH balance params._governor: The address of the GovernorCountingMultipleChoice contract.
params._initialOwner: The address to set as the initial owner of this contract.
params._timelock: The address of the Timelock contract authorized to call `distribute`.

distribute(uint256,uint8,address[]).details: MUST be called by the `timelock` address. Fetches vote counts for the `proposalId` from the `governor`. Identifies the `topN` winning options (including ties). Distributes the contract's entire ETH balance evenly among the recipients associated with the winning options via the `recipientsByOptionIndex` mapping.

params.proposalId: The ID of the GovernorCountingMultipleChoice proposal.
params.recipientsByOptionIndex: An array mapping proposal option index to recipient address.                                The length MUST match the number of options in the proposal.                                e.g., `recipientsByOptionIndex[0]` is the recipient for option 0.
params.topN: The number of top winning options to consider for distribution.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: Sets the Governor and Timelock addresses.

distribute(uint256,uint8,address[]).notice: Distributes the contract's ETH balance based on proposal results.
